author: Andy Bruce, Alistair Smout
title: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson continues to make progress, remains in intensive care - The Globe and Mail
description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson continues to make progress, remains in intensive care The Globe and Mail British PM Boris Johnson 'responding to treatment' for COVID-19 CBC.ca U.K. faces longer virus lockdown; Johnson's condition improves CTV News Sean S…
content:
A drawing reading 'We are in this together' hangs in a window of 10 Downing Street in London on April 9, 2020.
HENRY NICHOLLS/Reuters
British Prime Minister Boris Johnson has moved out of intensive care as he continues to recover from COVID-19, a spokesman … [+4378 chars]
